name: HolidayCounter
0:
”Alexa, open holiday counter”
”Alexa, start holiday counter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday counter
des: Using your Smart Home Alexa, you can count down the number of days for the most common holidays! Christmas, Halloween, Valentine's day, New years day/Eve, and St Patrick's day. You cannot count down specific holidays though. Like daylight savings time. But it can be useful for common holidays!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
